controller

Class AlbumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AlbumController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class AlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This controller controls the Album stage
    Author:
    Capki Kim, Daoun Oh

        Stores the thumbnail stage

        Keeps track of number of albums

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlbumController

        public AlbumController()

    • Method Detail

      • addAlbum

        public void addAlbum()
        Called by the addAlbum Button. Adds the new album prompted by the user. Checks for duplicate album name and empty name string.

      • openAlbum

        public void openAlbum(java.lang.String name,
                      int row,
                      int col)
        Opens the stage of the selected album.
        Parameters:
        name - album name
        row - current row in the GridPane
        col - current col in the GridPane

      • createAlbum

        public static java.lang.String createAlbum()
        Prompts the user to input the name of the new album to create a new Album.
        Returns:
        name of the new album, null if there is a duplicate or if there is no name

      • loadAlbums

        public void loadAlbums()
        Loads albums to the GridPane with the thumbnail of the first photo in the album and the name of the album.

      • back

        public void back()
        Called by the back button. Brings user back to the log in stage.

      • clearSelected

        public void clearSelected()
        Clears all borders of the selected item.

      • duplicates

        public static boolean duplicates(java.lang.String name)
        Checks for duplicate album name stored in albumlist.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new user
        Returns:
        true if there is a duplicate user, false otherwise

      • warnDuplicate

        public static void warnDuplicate()
        Alerts the user if there is a duplicate album name.

      • noNameAlert

        public static void noNameAlert()
        Alerts the user if there is empty input for name.

      • rename

        public void rename()
        Called when rename is selected in the drop down menu. Prompts the user to rename the selected album. Checks for duplicate album name.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Called when delete is selected in the drop down menu. Asks the user to confirm to delete selected album.

      • details

        public void details()
        Called when detail is selected in the drop down menu. Shows name, number of photos, oldest photo date, and range of dates of the photos in the album.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
